intro: Blastus yunnanensis, commonly known as Yunnan blastus, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its shrub-like growth habit. The plant features opposite, ovate leaves with serrated edges and produces small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments in mountainous regions. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
